ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank the patients and control persons for participating in this study. Funding source of the study was as follows. The Norwegian ParkWest study has been funded by the Research Council of Norway (177966), the Western Norway Regional Health Authority (911218), and the Norwegian Parkinson's Disease Association. Johannes Lange and Kristin Aaser Lunde are supported by the Western Norway Regional Health Authority (911698 and 911830).
